content.title: 5. Revisions and Errata
content.content: The materials appearing on our website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on our website are accurate, complete or current.

content.title: 6. Links
content.content: We have not reviewed all of the sites linked to our website and are not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by us of the site.

content.title: 7. Modifications
content.content: We may revise these terms of service for our website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AI Studio

items.question: What is AI Studio?
items.answer: AI Studio is a comprehensive AI platform that helps businesses and developers integrate intelligent features into their workflows and applications. Our tools include AI assistants, document processing, image generation, and API services.

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans starting with a free tier for basic usage. Our Pro plan includes advanced features and higher usage limits, while Enterprise plans are customized to your specific needs. All plans are billed monthly with no hidden fees.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. We use bank-grade encryption, implement strict access controls, and comply with industry security standards. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.

items.question: Do you offer technical support?
items.answer: Yes, all plans include some level of support. Free tier users have access to community support, Pro users get priority email support, and Enterprise customers receive 24/7 dedicated support with SLA guarantees.

items.question: Can I try before subscribing?
items.answer: Yes! You can start with our free tier which includes basic features and API calls. This allows you to test our services and see how they fit your needs before upgrading to a paid plan.

content.title: 1. Information Collection
content.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, and usage data.

content.title: 2. Use of Information
content.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new features, and to protect us and our users.

content.title: 3. Data Security
content.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

content.title: 4. Data Sharing
content.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third parties only in the following circumstances: with your consent, with our service providers, or when required by law.

content.title: 5. Your Rights
content.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to or restrict certain processing of your information.

content.title: 6. Cookies
content.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide and support our services. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

content.title: 7. Changes to Policy
content.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
